transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Hi sir, very good afternoon.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Mr. Vinayak se baat kar rahe hain right?
Customer: Haan bol raha hun.
Executive: Vinayak se Minakshi baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART head office se sir.
Actually aapke sath discuss karna tha mera last time ki gaadi IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan haan haan mujhe baat nahi ho payi.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Do dhai baje hi baat kare to achcha rehta hai kyunki main is samay na factory mein hota hun.
To I cannot tell you exactly what has happened on that. Haan haan.
Executive: To aap mujhe batayenge sir matlab offline online dono aap hi handle kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi main to handle hi nahi kar pa raha hun ki main idhar busy rehta hun to main kar nahi pa raha hun usko.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Aur main kisi aur ko lagane wala tha wo bhi abhi hua nahi hai wo try kar rahe hain abhi dekhte hain kisi ko ho jaye to jaldi yahi hum kar rahe hain. Hai na?
Executive: Sir try kab karenge sir teen char mahine already nikal chuke hain aur abhi kuch khas kiya nahi aapne IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan jo main kuch kaam hamari taraf se bhi nahi hua.
Executive: To ek kaam karti hun na sir thoda sa dekho agar aap nahi time de pa rahe ho IndiaMART pe theek hai by lead consume kar pa rahe ho hai na aap ek kaam kar sakte ho na main kuch shortcut tarike aapko batati hun jisse ki aapke liye easy ho jayega IndiaMART se application use karna. Hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To usi ke regarding mujhe aapse discuss karna tha like dekho thoda sa agar aap by leads vagerah pe active rahoge to aapko direct calls bhi aati hain sir direct calls ka flow badhane ke liye aap kya kar sakte ho wo main aapko guide kar deti hun is bar taki aapko bar bar application pe na jana pade. Haan haan haan.
Customer: Dekho direct call to abhi tak koi nahi aaya madam.
Executive: Abhi tak nahi aaye na kyunki abhi tak aapne chalaya hi nahi hai services sab.
Customer: Nahi humne chalaya to hai thoda bahut jo bhi chalaya hai usse to kuch ek bhi call nahi aaya.
Executive: Sir dekho main aapko batati hun ki starting period mein kya hota hai na sir initially jab aap start kar rahe ho kisi bhi online platform pe kisi bhi business mein chahe wo offline hi kyun na ho time to dena padega na sir aapko. Hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapko main jyada nahi keh rahi agar aap jyada occupied hote hain apne offline business mein na to aap ek kaam kar sakte ho at least aapko panch das minute to milte honge sir kabhi na kabhi ek do ghante ke beech mein panch das minute milte honge aapko hai na? To ek bar main aapko bata deti hun ki sir aapko jyada time na invest karna pade application pe theek hai? To kaun si by lead aapko consume karni hai turant ja ke dekhne ke baad. Theek hai? Kaun si by lead aapke liye important rahegi. Hai na? Us tarike se aap kaam kar sakte ho to iske liye bas mere ko panch se saat minute chahiye aapke hai na? Kuch shortcut tarike main bata deti hun jisse aapki help ho jayegi sir bar bar mujhe bhi call karne ki jarurat na pade aapko hai na?
Customer: Okay haan.
Executive: Aap mujhe batayenge aapka vaise mail id yahi hai sir? Vinayak Vinayak ke naam se hai na?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai okay aap ek bar mail check kijiye aapko link aaya hoga ek zoom meet ka waha pe ek bar main thoda sa shortcut tarike aapko bata rahi hun.
Customer: Ek minute dekhta hun ek minute hold.
Executive: Ji check kijiye.
Customer: Minakshi Sharma ke naam se hai kya?
Executive: Haanji bilkul sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hmmm usi ko aap ek minute join kijiye.
Customer: Haan magar madam main abhi aapko join karke wo site nahi dekh pa raha hun paunga to kya karenge ki isliye main keh raha hun us din talk to it at around 2:30 or quarter to three or three maximum.
Executive: Kaise keh rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Haan main keh raha hun haan 2 baje 2 baje ke 3 baje ke beech mein kabhi bhi haan haan.
Executive: Achcha do se teen ke beech mein kabhi bhi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir lunch ho jayega mera uske baad fir main nahi connect kar paunga aapka lunch to abhi.
Customer: Abhi kyunki mere paas access nahi hai computer ko abhi yaha main factory mein hun.
Executive: Achcha achcha to okay okay to aapne mobile pe nahi kiya hai sir application download?
Customer: Application hai magar wo sahi se kyun nahi hota chal nahi pata hai barabar haan.
Executive: Sir dekho main aapko batati hun system aap har kahin apna laptop nahi utha sakte ho theek hai? To aapke liye jyada easy kya hai aapke liye mobile hi jyada easy hai na sir jo aap kabhi bhi use kar sakte ho to mobile pe aap login kijiye na IndiaMART ke application. Aapko notification bhi aa jayegi jab koi by lead aati hai tab aapko turant notification bhi aa jati hai bahar hi koi call aa rahi hai aapko direct aapko phone ban jayega aapka to aapke liye wo jyada easy hai na sir system laptop nahi khol paoge na aap har waqt. Haan hmm hai na? Ye wala number jo aapka hai vaise aapka profile pe jo registered number hai wo aapke paas hi hai kya?
Customer: Haan hai mere paas hi hai.
Executive: Haan to usse aap login kar lo sir fatafat se. Hmm main usi pe hi aapko mobile ka screen share karke haanji.
Customer: Theek hai sir baad mein karna padega phone se haanji haan kab tak? Kyunki main abhi thoda sa busy hun isliye main keh raha tha I was waiting for some other call.
Executive: To main ek kaam karti hun 3 baje aapko call kar lun?
Customer: Haan kar lo that is better.
Executive: 3 baje pakka na?
Customer: Haan okay.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai 3 baje hum discuss karte hain. Okay ye application aap phone pe aap jo hai login kar lo. Haan okay theek hai okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not able to dedicate time to IndiaMART.

- Unable to handle online and offline work.

- Has not received any direct calls.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide on shortcut methods.

- Executive suggested using the mobile application.

- Executive offered to call back at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mobile app, direct calls, time management
